user_story: As a freelancer with variable income, I want the banking system to offer flexible account options, customizable notifications about transactions, real-time reporting of my balance, and the ability to categorize my expenses so that I can manage my finances more effectively and have a better understanding of my cash flow.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall provide at least three flexible account options tailored for freelancers with variable income.

2. The system shall allow users to customize and set up notifications for different transaction types, including deposits, withdrawals, and account balance changes.

3. The system shall display real-time reporting of the user's account balance, updating within seconds of any transaction.

4. The system shall enable users to categorize their expenses into predefined categories, allowing for easy tracking and analysis of spending patterns.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall provide at least three flexible account options tailored for freelancers with variable income.

2. The system shall allow users to customize and set up notifications for different transaction types, including deposits, withdrawals, and account balance changes.

3. The system shall display real-time reporting of the user's account balance, updating within seconds of any transaction.

4. The system shall enable users to categorize their expenses into predefined categories, allowing for easy tracking and analysis of spending patterns.
